sub_title: I am an open-minded, reflective, ambitious person who seeks new challenges. Since I have often outgrown myself, I know this growth can only happen outside my comfort zone.
summary:
I have been in the fashion industry since 2017. Here I worked as an intern in the areas of marketing and organization, as a temp in retail, and as a dual student in purchasing, sales, customer service and marketing. 

Staying abroad several times gave me an understanding of the European fashion industry, which brought me to Fashion Weeks in Berlin and Paris, as well as to trade fairs and conventions in Düsseldorf, Munich and Antwerp.

This allowed me to build a broad network and made it into the anniversary edition of TextilWirtschaft in 2021, as the voice of the next generation: 
https://www.textilwirtschaft.de/business/news/tw-jubilaeumsausgabe-modemanagement-student-fabian-weiss-der-handel-braucht-genderlose-abteilungen-232765

I use the knowledge I have gathered on my personal blog to help young professionals find their way into the fashion industry. Since I had to painstakingly gather all the information during my application process at the time, I would like to make it easier for the talents of the following generations and thus provide a point of contact: 
https://fwfashion97.wordpress.com/

Today the blog deals with other topics such as fashion weeks, LGBTQIA+ and feminism. 

If you have any further questions, I would be very happy to hear from you!

Because the jungle of study and training courses is getting denser and more complex. My goal is to make the way there a little easier for future students of the fashion industry.

The blog is written exclusively in German.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/D4E27AQFRMdLPWb52ag/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1692168868855?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=wh8WsFBc6Hriq_55C6r6RFo9OJgn5his8BAunD6bwgA'}, {'url': 'https://www.wilhelm-lorch-stiftung.de/foerder/pages/2023/fabian_weiss_und_kathleen_fortin.html', 'title': 'Wilhelm Lorch Foundation Award Winner', 'description': "The Wilhelm Lorch Foundation has the goal of promoting qualified young talent in the fashion industry.

awards:
[{'title': 'Winner of the Wilhelm Lorch Foundation Award', 'description': "The Wilhelm Lorch Foundation has the goal of promoting qualified young talent in the fashion industry.
It is supported by personalities and companies in the textile and fashion industry.

I was honored in the business category for my master's thesis. I wrote the thesis during my master's studies at Antwerp Management School in collaboration with the start-up UNDŌ.

The goal of the paper was to propose a clear value proposition and strategy for the successful launch of the UNDŌ Garments brand in the Belgian market, with the aim of offering sustainable clothing through rental and circular fashion models. This paper includes an analysis of the potential customers and the needs and insights of the target market. It also assesses the competitive environment of fashion rental companies.", 'issuer': 'Wilhelm-Lorch-Foundation', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, {'title': 'Stipendiat', 'description': 'Scholarship holder of the Studienstiftung des deutschen Volkes (German National Academic Foundation). 

The Studienstiftung des deutschen Volkes (German National Academic Foundation) is the oldest and largest foundation for the promotion of gifted students in the Federal Republic of Germany.

Supported by funds from the Federal Ministry of Education and Research as well as other governmental and non-governmental sponsors, 13 organizations for the promotion of gifted students in Germany provide financial and non-material support to particularly talented and committed students and doctoral candidates.

The foundations reflect the pluralism and social diversity of the Federal Republic of Germany. The Studienstiftung is the only organization that selects and supports scholarship holders independently of political, ideological, and religious guidelines.

The Studienstiftung was founded in Dresden in 1925, dissolved in 1934, and re-established as a registered association in Cologne in 1948.', 'issuer': 'Studienstiftung des deutschen Volkes', 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}]

The following tasks were included:
- Sales of the brands TomTailor, Mustang, Vanzetti, and b.belt (customer appointments, customer service, handling of the merchandise management system Fashion XL, support of sales agencies, organization in the intranet Bitrix).

- Buying Department (vacation replacement of the purchasing department in the Far East, supplier management, supplier controlling, inquiry management for the Design Department, working with the Therefore invoice system.

- Dressing assistance at the Fashion Show', 'title': 'Assistant during Fashion Week in Paris', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1246493, 'name': 'dfv Mediengruppe (Deutscher Fachverlag GmbH)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQH4ejoddE1CFA/company-logo_400_400/0/1625486457956?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=RgCDJP4deDIjWpm2ZFMoAmX2Whn02TjZn_EJJVen0cI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/dfvmediengruppe/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Frankfurt am Main, Hessen, Deutschland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'dfv Mediengruppe', 'description': 'This was an internship at the German news, business, and fashion magazine "TextilWirtschaft".

Tasks included: 
- Gathering information, evaluating and producing written articles for the print edition
- Preparing content for digital channels, including newsletter, website, and social media
- Working in the content management system (CMS) for website and newsletter, as well as in the editorial system CCI for the print publication
- Creating articles, image galleries including image editing in the online CMS
- Conducting interviews and customer surveys including photography
- Accompanying editors and research during fashion fairs in Berlin and Düsseldorf', 'title': 'Editorial Internship', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 6848044, 'name': 'MORITZ Verlag', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/moritz-verlag/', 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Heilbronn (Landkreis), Baden-Württemberg, Deutschland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'MORITZ Verlag', 'description': 'Tasks included:

- Visiting and photographing events
- Writing Facebook posts, answering user inquiries, entering appointments on the website, and uploading e-papers via Metropublisher. 
- Occasional assistance at the visitor reception', 'title': 'Editorial Internship', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1576010, 'name': 'ORSAY', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHy_resxUB1Nw/company-logo_400_400/0/1584456473334?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=tr108TgWeqcvRvy7fS5L0I1jjGJABOkAutyM-12sf9Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/orsay/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Heilbronn (Landkreis), Baden-Württemberg, Deutschland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'orsay', 'description': 'Tasks included: 
- Sales activities
